mean_en: done alone; without other people; (of a person or an animal) enjoying being alone; frequently spending time alone; (of a person, thing or place) alone, with no other people or things around; (especially in negative sentences and questions) only one
sentence: A solitary man is standing in the cold wind alone.
sentence_trans: 一个孤独的男人正站在寒风之中。
word_etyma: soli单独 + tary形容词后缀 → solitary孤独的
